cmp: 门 (opening/door/gate/doorway/gateway/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy))
mng: to dodge, to duck out of the way, to beat it, shaken (by a fall), to sprain, to pull a muscle, lightning, spark, a flash, to flash (across one's mind), to leave behind, (Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

exm.mng: to dodge, to duck out of the way, to beat it, shaken (by a fall), to sprain, to pull a muscle, lightning, spark, a flash, to flash (across one's mind), to leave behind, (Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
to glint, to glitter, to sparkle, to radiate
to evade, to dodge (out of the way)
brilliant, shiny, a flare, to glisten, to twinkle
to flash through (one's mind), to dodge (away from pursuers)
lit. flash point, crucial point, essential point
lightning wedding, to get married on the spur of the moment
to get out of the way
